name: pTron KWM-1 Omnidirectional Type C Wireless Microphone (Black)
reviewText: Based on 15K+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The pTron KWM-1 is a compact omnidirectional wireless microphone designed for content creators, vloggers, and online educators. Featuring DSP noise cancellation and a 25m wireless range, it ensures clear and stable audio recording. With plug-and-play functionality and Type-C support, it works seamlessly with Android smartphones and compatible iPhones, making it ideal for video recording, interviews, and live streaming.

customerReviews.comment: Great microphone for the price. Audio quality is clear and works perfectly for Instagram reels and YouTube shorts.
Easy to use and lightweight. Noise cancellation works well indoors.
Good battery and stable connection. Range is decent for outdoor shoots.

name: Noise Pulse 2 Max 1.85" Display Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch (Deep Wine)
reviewText: Based on 1L+ customer ratings on Amazon
description: The Noise Pulse 2 Max Smartwatch features a large 1.85-inch display with 550 nits brightness for excellent outdoor visibility. Equipped with Bluetooth calling, Smart DND, and up to 10 days of battery life, it is designed for everyday fitness and productivity. With support for 100+ sports modes and health tracking features, this smartwatch is ideal for both men and women.
features: Bluetooth calling with built-in microphone & speaker

customerReviews.comment: Amazing display quality and Bluetooth calling works smoothly. Battery easily lasts a week.

name: Yonex Mavis 350 Green Cap Nylon Shuttlecock (Yellow)
reviewText: Based on 32,482 customer ratings on Amazon
description: Yonex Mavis 350 Green Cap nylon shuttlecocks are designed to deliver excellent durability and consistent flight performance. Known for their quick recovery time, these shuttlecocks closely match the performance of feather shuttles and are ideal for regular practice and competitive play in warm conditions.
features: High-quality nylon shuttlecocks for consistent performance
Fast recovery time of 0.02 seconds after smash
Ideal for training and match play
usageGuidelines: Green cap recommended for warm climates (22°C–33°C)
Store in a cool, dry place
Use appropriate shuttle speed based on temperature

customerReviews.comment: Excellent durability and very consistent flight. Perfect for daily practice.
